title: How to Get Your Teddy Bear Ready to Go Out with You

steps.headline: Give your teddy bear a good scrub.
steps.description: Get a washcloth and mild shampoo. Gently wipe your teddy and scrub a bit to get some of the stains out! Don't wash it too much, or it could permanently damage your precious teddy!

steps.headline: Put teddy in the dryer for 5 minutes.
steps.description: Do not put him or her in there for longer! He/she may shrink and you might have to throw him/her out!

steps.headline: Brush his/her fur.
steps.description: Make him/her look nice and well groomed! You want your teddy bear to look nice when going out. You can visit build-a-bear workshop to purchase some cool outfits for your bear!

steps.headline: Tell your teddy where you are going.
steps.description: He/she may not know and get scared and run away!

steps.headline: When you get there, let your teddy bear get used to the feel of it.
steps.description: Let him/her look around for a moment. Explain a few things if needed.

steps.headline: Include your teddy bear in the shopping, too!
steps.description: He/she may want to help! Ask for his/her opinion on some of the clothing you want.

steps.headline: On the ride home, let teddy take a nap if needed!
steps.description: They don't like it when they don't get the rest they need! If you are on a bicycle and have a front basket, put teddy in there. You can also put them in the back of your backpack, but make sure your teddy can breathe!

text: Give your teddy bear a good scrub. Get a washcloth and mild shampoo. Gently wipe your teddy and scrub a bit to get some of the stains out! Don't wash it too much, or it could permanently damage your precious teddy! Put teddy in the dryer for 5 minutes. Do not put him or her in there for longer! He/she may shrink and you might have to throw him/her out! Brush his/her fur. Make him/her look nice and well groomed! You want your teddy bear to look nice when going out. You can visit build-a-bear workshop to purchase some cool outfits for your bear! Tell your teddy where you are going. He/she may not know and get scared and run away! When you get there, let your teddy bear get used to the feel of it. Let him/her look around for a moment. Explain a few things if needed. Include your teddy bear in the shopping, too! He/she may want to help! Ask for his/her opinion on some of the clothing you want. On the ride home, let teddy take a nap if needed! They don't like it when they don't get the rest they need! If you are on a bicycle and have a front basket, put teddy in there. You can also put them in the back of your backpack, but make sure your teddy can breathe!
